Description: Wooden comb, broken at one end carved to produce tapering teeth on both edges: on one edge are preserved 11 large teeth; on the other are 22 thinner teeth closely-spaced. Decoration comprises a pair of shallow incised sets of concentric circles on each side.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Qasr Ibrim (Nubia), House LC1-8 Room 6 Level: Upper Fill
